definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
On the correct handling of internal contradictions among the people, Mao Zedong's tract of 1957
pinyin: zheng4 que4 chu3 li3 ren2 min2 nei4 bu4 mao2 dun4
containing_words.word: 正確處理人民內部矛盾

sentences.english: Then the nail must be straightened before it can be hammered into place correctly.
sentences.chinese: 於是在把釘子正確地釘入之前，需要先弄直它。

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，許多家長怎麼也學不會正確地和孩子交談。

sentences.english: Proper sealing and protection of material carton after usage or opening by IQC or warehouse operator.
sentences.chinese: IQC或倉管員開箱或取用物料後正確封箱和保護。

sentences.english: Why can't we always say the solution is X = A inverse B?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼“解爲X=A逆，B”不總是正確？

sentences.english: Watching from the boat, Mr Kirkconnell is sure Mr Clasen the right decision.
sentences.chinese: 事發時在船上的卡梅倫稱，克拉森作出了正確的決定。
因爲這個答案未必正確。

sentences.english: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
sentences.chinese: 雄性是多美啊，假如它發現它正確的表達方式。

sentences.english: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentences.chinese: 添加正確的水量和組裝的過濾器。

sentences.english: Anderson has the attitude for comedy, but not the aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 導演有對於喜劇片的態度，但是也許並不正確。

sentences.english: He was right, of course, to avoid the mayoralty trap.
sentences.chinese: 當然，他躲開了市長這個圈套倒是正確的。

sentences.english: A dog with the correct proportions and angulation can thereby achieve static balance.
sentences.chinese: 擁有的正確比例和角度，從而達到犬隻的靜態平衡。

sentences.english: That should be the attitude that we in the media should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們這些媒體人應有的正確態度。

sentences.english: Grandpa: To catch fish, you need the right magic.
sentences.chinese: 要釣到魚，你得有正確的魔法。

sentences.english: That is especially true for antiretroviral therapy.
sentences.chinese: 這些對於反轉錄酶療法的確相當正確。

sentences.english: How good a guesser would you have to be to get the sequence EXACTLY correct?
sentences.chinese: 孔明有多好，你必須獲得序列完全正確？

sentences.english: Brown is right on with his handicapping of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 布朗的理解也並非不正確。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
